availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen H. Young (Carter County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Joseph Young and Rebecca Young. Married to Emily McGuire Young in Carter County, Kentucky, on November 10, 1859. Father of Henry Young and Mary A. Young. Resident of Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Carter County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a captain from September 29, 1863, to December 30, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 194B.
